titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Aaron Burr Papers
1777-1836
MS 90
titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:39 -0400.

did.abstract:
Correspondence, 1777-1836, and a few dockets, writs, leases, and miscellaneous papers of Aaron Burr. Papers pertain to such matters as his military service during the Revolutionary War, land transactions, his duel with Alexander Hamilton, politics (mostly 1808), his private affairs, and (the greatest number) his law practice and the affairs of his clients.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Aaron Burr papers

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection is not processed. As part of a project conducted in 2019-20, archivist Elise Winks performed a high level survey of the collection and described it broadly in this preliminary finding aid.
